column1: #Text=Katara says : " Who are all these people ? "
#Text=They 're lined up in a pattern : air , water , earth and fire .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's the Avatar Cycle .
#Text=All these people are your past lives , Aang .
#Text=Katara , you really believe in that stuff ?
#Text=When the Avatar dies , he 's reincarnated into the next nation in the cycle .
